answerText: Prandtl number [or Prandtl modulus][10] If the Prandtl number is equal to one, the velocity and thermal versions of this quantity are the same. Symbolized delta, the thermal version of this quantity is the distance between a surface and the point where the temperature is equal to 99% of the free-stream temperature.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Chicago A + Illinois B  | 2 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This quantity used when performing dimensional analysis of convection is important because it does not depend on the fluid's velocity or a characteristic length. For 10 points each: [10] Name this quantity equal to the ratio of momentum diffusivity to thermal diffusivity.
